tab1.title: Instructions
tab1.warningInstructions: Using the platerecognizer service has privacy implications. Use at own risk. Read and understand your local privacy legislation, and the terms of use from platerecognizer.
tab1.registerInstructions: For a free API key, go to app.platerecognizer.com/accounts/signup
tab1.useTitle: How to use in a flow
tab1.useInstructions: Use a flow to send a camera image to the app. The app will try to find license plates in this image, and will trigger a flowcard for each plate it finds.

tab3.title: Settings
tab3.instructionsKey: Enter the API Key that you obtained from the platerecognizer website.
tab3.instructionsMatch: A higher confidence threshold will reduce incorrect plate recognitions. Optionally fill in the matching country codes separated by a comma. Leave empty for automatic region search. List of country codes: docs.platerecognizer.com/#countries
